mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.name, m.parent_id, m.sort_order, m.path, m.component, m.redirect, m.query_param, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.icon, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role ro on ro.id = sur.role_id ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}

select distinct m.id, m.name, m.parent_id, m.sort_order, m.path, m.component, m.redirect, m.query_param, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.status, m.perms, m.icon, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role ro on ro.id = sur.role_id left join sys_user u on u.user_id = sur.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('FOLDER', 'MENU') and m.status = '0' and ro.status = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.sort_order
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role sur on rm.role_id = sur.role_id

select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id left join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_role r on r.id = sur.role_id where m.status = '0' and r.status = '0' and sur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on rm.menu_id = m.id where m.status = '0' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
